execution_quality: Agent methodically investigated the problem through code review and testing, making targeted edits to sorting/grouping logic, but the follow-up message suggests the issue persisted or recurred after changes.
work_category: Configuration troubleshooting for email archive system. Agent identified that newly subscribed folders weren't being grouped correctly after the user pointed out sorting issues.
summary: The agent made deliberate edits to address the archive grouping issue, but the follow-up message indicates the problem wasn't fully resolved—newly subscribed folders (particularly from nnmaildir+hnst.sh:Inbox) are still appearing in the wrong location (Drafts instead of Archive). The agent appears to have misunderstood or incompletely addressed the root cause of folder sorting on subscription.
follow_up_pattern: User reports a new or recurring problem where archive directories aren't sorted into the correct group after re-subscribing. This suggests either the agent's fix didn't work or there's a separate issue with folder initialization/registration.
